text: György Baló (14 June 1947 – 18 March 2019) was a Hungarian broadcast journalist and academic lecturer. He was an anchorman for many political talk shows and worked for the Hungarian public television channel Magyar Televízió (MTV) since the 1970s. He was born in Budapest. Baló died on 18 March 2019 from esophageal cancer in Budapest, aged 71. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Television presenters Category:Political commentators Category:Writers from Budapest
title: György Baló
